annotations.title: Advanced Techniques - Clarified Milk Punch

textContent:
1 cup Whole Milk
1/3 cup Lemon Juice 
2 cups Black tea
2/3 cup Port
2/3 cup Batavia Arrack or Light rum
85g Sugar

Pour all ingredients except milk together. 
Pour mixture over milk and stir. 
Rest for at least 30 minutes and strain with nut milk bag twice. 
Run through coffee filter
